thread.title: Lovely boutique hotel with wonderful staff!
thread.title_full: Lovely boutique hotel with wonderful staff! - Review of Hotel Keppler, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: colleenlraper
title: Lovely boutique hotel with wonderful staff!
text: My husband and I visited the Hotel Keppler this month and absolutely loved our stay. The hotel is a quiet gem, just off Champs Elysee and a lovely walk (about 15-20 minutes) from the Eiffel Tower. The staff, particularly Philip and Brinder are so nice and incredibly helpful. We loved our stay and hope to return again.
